        public g4p_controls.ZCaret getCaretCharPos(float screenX,
                                  float screenY,
                                  g4p_controls.ZCaret caret)
        Get the Caret for a given screen pixel position. It takes care of the position of the buffer on the screen and any offset for the text (allowance for scrolling)
        Parameters:
        screenX -
        screenY -
        caret -

      • getCaretInfo

        public g4p_controls.CaretInfo getCaretInfo(g4p_controls.ZCaret c,
                                  g4p_controls.CaretInfo ci)
        Get the information needed to draw the caret.
        Parameters:
        c - the Caret we are interested in
        ci - the matching caret information
        Returns:
        the match caret information

      • getCaretInfo

        public g4p_controls.CaretInfo getCaretInfo(int pn,
                                  int pln,
                                  int cn,
                                  g4p_controls.CaretInfo ci)
        Get the caret information. Assumes that we are assuming the leading edge is true.
        Parameters:
        pn - paragraph number
        pln - paragraph line number
        cn - character number in line
        ci - the caret information
        Returns:
        the match caret information
